name: Escape Initiative
description:
Escape Initiative is an action precision platformer where you play as a cyborg awakened in a strange place with an extreme urge to escape.

Features

  • Customizable character color and laser color
  • Normal difficulty with forgiving checkpoints
  • Hardcore difficulty with beneficial checkpoints disabled
  • 60 Levels
  • Achievements

Wishlist now for discounts!

*Trailer music by Alex McCulloch
